title: NotATether
author: NotATether
created_time: September 30, 2022, 11:05:39 PMLast edit: January 08, 2024, 03:39:12 AM by NotATether
content: BitcoinCleanup.com is a nonprofit website that debunks myths about Bitcoin's energy use and spreads information about Proof of Work.This is a free campaign; you do not get paid for wearing these materials. You should wear them to help the cause.Likewise, there is no weekly post minimum/maximum or spreadsheet, and there is no campaign manager monitoring this thread (that doesn't mean you can spam though): Do not attempt to post an application form, because there is none. People who want to participate can indicate so by replying here. Feel free to wear and remove them an unlimited number of times.New avatars and signatures are below. If you're wearing the old avatar, please update it as this one looks much better.If you would like to participate in the social media campaign, please go here.AvatarPersonal TextCode:Defend Bitcoin and its PoW: bitcoincleanup.comMemberBitcoinCleanUp.com • Debunking Bitcoin's Energy UseTwitter • #EndTheFUDCode:[center][font=arial comments.author: coupable
comments.body: This is a wonderful initiative. The site will be of great interest to Bitcoin enthusiasts.I encourage all members who are not participating in paid signature campaigns to at least wear signature and avatar until they are accepted into another campaign.I'm first on the list

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Of course I am already putting on the avatar for this project. Its good to know there is a signature for it and I would gladly put it on as as defense to something that I care about, something that has brought a light to the shades of our time.Having something speak for bitcoin in the times of energy fud that has gained momentum and its only encouraging for all who believe in Satoshi Nakamoto initiative to show some concern.My signature and avatar space remains open to this course.Good choice of colour for this course. Making the crypto and digital space green again with bitcoin as a focal point. Big ups to this initiative.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: This is the best time to put in some positive vibes into promoting Bitcoin proof of work algorithm through my signature and avatar, even though we have being advocating for Bitcoin proof of work algorithm on a personal basis, we can do more now that we wear this signature and avatar to support this initiative. There have being alot of negative comments around the web about the disadvantages of Bitcoin proof of work algorithm even though proof of stake has alot of security set back it is being promoted to the gullible member of the cryptocurrency community as the best replacement to Bitcoin proof of work and they argument is that proof of work consume more energy and is not environmental friendly, even though that is a false claim they still paddle that claim.So this project is needed to cleanup the crytocurrency community with the right information.officially am registering my participation in this project!

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Am green and good to good. The signature logo looks nice. Thanks to the designer.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: I'm proud to be part of this movement, because Bitcoin has done a lot of things to me and my family that made me to promise myself that I will continue to spread the information about Bitcoin in my country despite Bitcoin is not yet legalized,But based on the information we Bitcoiners in the country have been sending to our parliament, show that soon they will make it legal in the country before 2023. No doubt, Bitcoin must demonstrate all over the whole world soon because this movement will attract more members to be part of this movement.NotATether you are doing a great job please keep it on, Signature updated ,am fully ready to spread the information.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Good initiative. I am wearing the signature but I'll keep my current avatar.Keep up the good work.

comments.author: NdaMk
comments.body: Good initiative. Let's make the world Green with bitcoin

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: NotATether is a reputable member. We can trust on his initiative without any doubt.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: Let's spread the word BitcoinCleanup.com while hoping the Bitcoin market goes Green too. I'm very happy to join here signature and Avatar has been updated.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: This is looking good on me. The green and white logo for bitcoin is also the colours of the Nigerian flag and moreover today is the 62nd Independence day of Nigeria. The challenges of Nigeria is on the governance and not on the people and one day we shall get it right by electing purposeful Nigerians into government and things will turn around for good then the youth will have the freedom of proudly and openly adopting the bitcoin train without any government interference. It is a win... for bitcoin.It is green all the way. Bitcoin wins, Nigeria wins, Africa wins and the world freedom is assured.

comments.author: avp2306
comments.body: Green looks good and will wear this temporarily.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Hopefully my avatar and personal area will give some exposure to this project. Good thought.

comments.author: MusaPk
comments.body: I need few more activity to reach Member level. I will wear signature as soon as I reach Member level.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: Great idea!I'm going to use it while I'm in between paid campaigns.

comments.author: dbc23
comments.body: The green looks natural and earthy. Pow energy usage isn't as bad as it's been projected by the government. If not for anything else it has guaranteed security and a reward system for miners. Biitcoincleanup.com is a good move for the Bitcoin community

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Just right from the colour being used, you could see the relevance of how green colour has been used for a numbers of many positive indications and this campaign as well will go a big way forward in raising a unanimous voice in support for bitcoin PoW and the environmental friendliness of it energy consumption, continue to go green bitcoin!

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Will wear the personal text, it's time for a change over my profile text area and to promote awareness in this cause. Thanks for bringing it up @NotATheter!

comments.author: Harkorede
comments.body: Nice initiative!I'll ask from my current campaign managers, if it's okay by them, I'll also wear the personal text too.
